products.name: Green Cardamom
products.description: Known as the 'Queen of Spices', our green cardamom is hand-picked from the Western Ghats of Kerala, offering an intense aroma and sweet, floral flavor.
products.storageTips: Store in an airtight container away from heat and light. Use within 6 months for best aroma.

products.name: Black Pepper
products.description: The 'King of Spices' from the pristine hills of Wayanad. Our Malabar black pepper is sun-dried naturally, delivering a bold, pungent kick with complex undertones.
products.storageTips: Keep in a cool, dry place. Grind fresh for maximum flavor. Whole peppercorns last up to 3 years.

products.name: Cloves
products.description: Aromatic flower buds harvested from the clove tree. Our cloves are carefully selected for their high essential oil content, providing intense flavor and fragrance.
products.storageTips: Store whole cloves in airtight containers. Keeps well for up to 2 years when stored properly.

products.name: Cinnamon Sticks
products.description: True Ceylon cinnamon, known for its delicate, sweet flavor. Our cinnamon sticks are carefully rolled and dried, perfect for both sweet and savory dishes.
products.storageTips: Keep in a cool, dark place. Whole sticks maintain flavor longer than ground cinnamon.

products.name: Cumin Seeds (Zeera)
products.description: Premium quality cumin seeds with an earthy, warm flavor. Our zeera is sourced from the finest farms of Rajasthan, essential for authentic Indian cooking.
products.storageTips: Store in airtight containers. Toast lightly before grinding for enhanced flavor.
